name: Christmas Find Santa
description:
Happy Christmas – it’s the spookiest holiday of the year! 

Join us on a Christmas Find Santa through Gift houses, graveyards and House worlds full of Santa, ghouls, mystery and more. You’ll have hours of fun trying to find Difference artistically designed levels bringing the Halloween spirit to life!

Are you brave enough to play with the lights off at night? 


Are you ready for our brand new Christmas game? Get ready to quickly find hidden things in “Christmas Find Santa”! Get ready for Halloween 2017 with the best new scary games! If you like Halloween games, these “Christmas Find santa” are an excellent choice for you! Happy Christmas to all of you, enjoy the best Halloween house quest! Call for the good Christmas Santa and enjoy this Christmas special edition of “Christmas Find Santa”! Enter the haunted house and look for the orange pumpkin and candlesticks! Scary House games only for you! Get your magnifying glass and start looking for “hidden objects”!

🎃 10+ Awesome Level!
🎃 Impressive graphics!
🎃 Catchy melodies!
🎃 Hit Option!
🎃 Supported in All Devices !
🎃 Completely free of charge!
🎃 100 % anti-boredom!

-------------------------------
GAME MODES
-------------------------------

▸ Free Play
For a relaxing Christmas Find Santa experience, Free Play lets you find objects at your own pace. Hunt for Hint using their picture, silhouette, word or random combination. With no time pressure you can enjoy the spooky, Halloween themed levels without worrying about a time limit. 

Are you ready for some mystery games? Christmas Find games for free for your quick fingers only! Get ready to enjoy magnificent pictures in Christmas style! Enhance your mental skills and get your vocabulary rocking with the best Christmas horror games. If you're in the mood for the holiday spirit, these phenomenal Christmas games will bring the joy of Christmas to your mobile phone or tablet! This Halloween theme hidden objects game will do miracles for your mental skills – your concentration, focus, and detail-recognition will be improved on a long-term basis. Christmas countdown 2017 has already started, are you also counting the days to the costume party? This time of the year everyone is euphoric to have the best Christmas costume, so download this free game by Softhelaer Entertaiments Christmas Find Santa and join the happy crowd of Christmas fans!



Try our other free games Here : https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=5293430825594963960

Happy Christmas For Everyone , Don't Forgot to share and Rate our Games..!
